title: Language Data Analysis Process Based on Explicit Mathematics Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistical concepts and experience with data visualization tools
context.additional_context: A program training 20-something university students in mathematical foundations for language data analysis through explicit instruction, combining online modules and offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can create data visualization reports using explicit modeling techniques for language pattern frequency analysis.
Learners can perform statistical significance verification procedures for language data according to teacher feedback system principles.
Learners can implement algorithms to analyze numerical characteristics of language datasets through structured practice opportunities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
